languages.text: {n}Арбитр замирает, на лбу выступают бисеринки пота.{/n} "Мне надо рассказать вам о своем прошлом, если, конечно, вы пожелаете выслушать".
{n}He freezes, beads of sweat forming on his brow.{/n} "I need to tell you something about my past... if you care to listen, that is."
languages.original_text: {n}Арбитр замирает, на лбу выступают бисеринки пота.{/n} "Мне надо рассказать вам о своем прошлом, если, конечно, вы пожелаете выслушать".

traits.locale_text: {n}He freezes, beads of sweat forming on his brow.{/n} "I need to tell you something about my past... if you would care to listen, that is."
{n}He freezes, beads of sweat forming on his brow.{/n} "I need to tell you something about my past... if you would care to listen, that is."

{n}He freezes, beads of sweat forming on his brow.{/n} "I need to tell you something about my past... if you care to listen, that is."
{n}He freezes, beads of sweat forming on his brow.{/n} "I need to tell you something about my past... if you care to listen, that is."

languages.text: {n}彼は動きを止めた。その額に汗がにじみ始める。{/n}「過去について話しておきたいことがあります…もし聞いてくださるなら、ですが」
languages.original_text: {n}He freezes, beads of sweat forming on his brow.{/n} "I need to tell you something about my past... if you care to listen, that is."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼は動きを止めた。その額に汗がにじみ始める。{/n}「過去について話しておきたいことがあります…もし聞いてくださるなら、ですが」

languages.text: {n}Er erstarrt und auf seiner Stirn bilden sich Schweißerlen.{/n} "Ich muss Euch etwas über meine Vergangenheit erzählen ... falls Ihr willens seid, zuzuhören."
languages.original_text: {n}He freezes, beads of sweat forming on his brow.{/n} "I need to tell you something about my past... if you care to listen, that is."

traits.locale_text: {n}Er erstarrt und auf seiner Stirn bilden sich Schweißerlen.{/n} "Ich muss Euch etwas über meine Vergangenheit erzählen ... falls Ihr willens seid, zuzuhören."

languages.text: {n}Il se fige et vous remarquez des gouttes de sueur perler sur son front.{/n} « J'aimerais vous parler de mon passé... Si vous avez le temps de m'écouter, bien évidemment. »
languages.original_text: {n}He freezes, beads of sweat forming on his brow.{/n} "I need to tell you something about my past... if you care to listen, that is."

traits.locale_text: {n}Il se fige et vous remarquez des gouttes de sueur perler sur son front.{/n} « J'aimerais vous parler de mon passé... Si vous avez le temps de m'écouter, bien évidemment. »

languages.text: {n}El Arbitrator se queda petrificado, y su frente se perla de gotas de sudor.{/n} «Tengo que contarle una cosa sobre mi pasado... si tiene a bien escucharme, claro».
languages.original_text: {n}He freezes, beads of sweat forming on his brow.{/n} "I need to tell you something about my past... if you care to listen, that is."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Arbitrator se queda petrificado, y su frente se perla de gotas de sudor.{/n} «Tengo que contarle una cosa sobre mi pasado... si tiene a bien escucharme, claro».

languages.text: {n}他僵在原地，额头上冒出了汗珠。{/n}“我得告诉你一些我过去的事情……当然，如果你愿意听的话。”
languages.original_text: {n}He freezes, beads of sweat forming on his brow.{/n} "I need to tell you something about my past... if you care to listen, that is."

traits.locale_text: {n}他僵在原地，额头上冒出了汗珠。{/n}“我得告诉你一些我过去的事情……当然，如果你愿意听的话。”

languages.text: {n}Donakalıyor ve alnında ter damlaları beliriyor.{/n} "Size geçmişimle ilgili bir şey anlatmam gerekiyor... Eğer siz de dinlemek isterseniz tabii."
languages.original_text: {n}He freezes, beads of sweat forming on his brow.{/n} "I need to tell you something about my past... if you care to listen, that is."
